item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Fixing an Elgato HD60 S HDMI capture device with the help of Ghidra (169 points | 8 comments)
2. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (50 points | 22 comments)
3. Show HN: Void, an open-source Cursor/GitHub Copilot alternative (105 points | 42 comments)

5. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (141 points | 65 comments)

8. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (284 points | 130 comments)
9. Master Hexagonal Architecture in Rust (43 points | 29 comments)

12. rainfrog – a database management TUI for Postgres (44 points | 10 comments)
13. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (1095 points | 1191 comments)

20. Stepwise selection of variables in regression is Evil (3 points | discuss)
21. Dissecting the gzip format (2011) (49 points | 13 comments)
22. Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump (126 points | 49 comments)
23. A lonely man in his 30s found community in an unlikely place: spin class (77 points | 77 comments)
24. Titan Submersible Marine Board of Investigation (54 points | 17 comments)
25. Michigan Micro Mote (M3) makes history as the smallest computer (2015) (24 points | 3 comments)
26. Indiana police are seizing FedEx packages containing cash (245 points | 178 comments)
27. The Pragmatic Programmer for Machine Learning (133 points | 21 comments)
28. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (213 points | 139 comments)
29. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (136 points | 30 comments)
30. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (384 points | 270 comments)
